name: Slime adventure(Impulse)
description:
• You need to get the slime to the door.
  • Skeletons can be beaten like Mario. You can push in the back.
  • In the second level, a bad game design decision with a lever, when you pull it, we don't see that the door has opened.
Control
  • One tap - Use the item next to the slime (Lever, door)
  • If you hold down anywhere on the screen, then zones appear around this point.
  • Keep in the brown zone - move left and right
  • Keep in the blue zone - prepare to jump
    • To jump, release in the blue zone
    • Move your finger down to cancel the jump
    • You can jump off walls
